item.title: Five Thousand Days and One Night
About me
item.description: Iâ€™m Joel Aguilozi, a Science Fiction writer eager to expand my horizons and venture into the world of production and artistic direction. As a passionate art enthusiast, I have worked as a chronicler and photographer at music concerts, and I am very dedicated to video games as a fan, gamer, tester, and analyst. I have always enjoyed creating things, and to my writing production, I add experiences in programming and 3D design.

item.title: Library
item.description: Reading Software Engineering at Google: Lessons Learned from Programming Over Time by Titus Winters, Tom Manshreck, Hyrum Wright The Phoenix Project: A Novel about IT, DevOps, and Helping Your Business Win by Gene Kim, Kevin Behr, George Spafford Mastering Vim Quickly: From WTF to OMG in no time by Jovica Ilic Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software by Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, John Vlissides La semana laboral de 4 horas by Timothy Ferriss Read The Go Programming Language by Alan A.
